content: Resale HDB Property 99.co Event Asked by AnonymousAsked on 22 May 2019Should I buy a cheap, central location but old resale 3 room hdb flat with my foreign spouse? Reason being, I can rent it if it’s central and if it go through enbloc, I can earn more ?Does anybody thought about this strategy and what is the implications of it ?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Douglas Chow, Chief Enlightenment Officer at Empower AdvisoryLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 27 May 2019Hi there Douglas here. 2nd Keynote speaker.This strategy is fine but pls take note that enbloc is not guaranteed. Have a plan B in case it doesn't go enbloc forever.​​​
You can always connect with me via https://www.facebook.com/douglas.chow.908 or simply whatsapp/sms my company 24/7 hotline @83324283
Remember, plan your finances properly, don’t overstretch, do your homework and enjoy your property investment journey.
